id: Variation of conditions 23, 24, 25 and 28 of approval 16/07938/OT to permit conditions 23 and 24 to be amended to prescribe a specified proportion of A1 comparison retail floorspace to be provided within units below 480 sq.m GEA; condition 25 - increase 840 sq.m figure for 'small retail units' to 1,130 sq.m, with no single unit having a floorspace of more than 150 sq.m GEA; condition 28 update to reflect condition 25 above to the 105 sq.m figure; and removal of condition 50 (delivery of MLLR) of approval 16/07938/OT. - NON MATERIAL AMENDMENT TO 18/05310/FU - 1) Minor changes to the material of the Wind Mitigation Screen, from vertical baffles to perforated panels. The positioning, colour and dimensions (regency gold 1) of the mitigation screen will remain the same. 2) A reduction in the projection of the canopy from the building line (c. 700mm) 3) A change to the material of the canopy from anodised gold cladding to pressed metal gold cladding. 3) Replacement of the green wall to the west elevation with black facing brickwork, reflecting detailing elsewhere on the building. Note that this does not preclude scope for the operator to introduce a green wall to reflect their specification and maintenance regime. 4) Repositioning of a door on the north elevation and inclusion of a small plant area screened with anodised aluminium solid panels (in regency gold 1).
addr: Land Between Barrowby Lane And Manston Lane Thorpe Park Leeds LS15 8ZB
